headline: Ask HN: What data do you need in a market analysis?
description:
Hi all.

I am creating a tool for analyzing European markets. We collect data on the economic activity of 23M businesses, analyze it and help small businesses and startups find the market with the highest ROI.

Here (https://tinyurl.com/27ckalss) and here (https://tinyurl.com/26ncepnn) you can see a list of the datasets.

I'd really like feedback from the community in the form of answers to three questions.

    Do you understand what we are doing?
    Is the data we are collecting enough for you?
    What data (missing from the list) do you need to make a decision about entering a new market?
I would really appreciate a few minutes of your time. Thank you.
